document_data.name: ''Jawzah''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''jawzah''''' ({{Pronounce|jauh|ZAH}}) was a stringed fiddle-like [[Zakhara]]n instrument.{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.Description: A ''jawzah'' resembled a thin spiked fiddle with four strings connected to a small soundbox made from a hollowed-out [[coconut]] shell. A bow made from horsehair was used to play the instrument.
document_data.History: Since coconuts were used for the soundbox of a ''jawzah'', these instruments were popular among the sailors and travelers of the [[Golden Gulf]] and the ports surrounding it.
